member.name: P:MohawkCollege.EHR.gpmr.Pipeline.Renderer.Deki.Templates.__Default_nopub
P:MohawkCollege.EHR.gpmr.Pipeline.Renderer.Deki.Templates.Classic
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <docTemplate name="Default" author="Justin Fyfe" output="text/html" xmlns="http://marc.mohawkcollege.ca/hi">
<!-- Defines what goes on any outputted file, no matter what --> <globalTemplate> <![CDATA[ <!-- This page was automatically generated using the General Purpose Mif Rendering Tool using the DEKI-WIKI rendering extension.
Rendered By: $user$ Rendered On: 01-09-2009 at $time$ Article Title: $value$ --> <style type="text/css"> .rightCol { padding: [rest of string was truncated]";.
